name: LD43- Save Or Sacrifice?
description:
You are a conservation worker assigning funding to native New Zealand species. Unfortunately, however, there isn't enough money to go around. It's up to you to decide who to sacrifice, and who to save.

Up arrows- click to increase funding.

Down arrows - click to decrease funding.

The population increases or decreases depending on how much money you spend.

Try to save as many as you can without going bankrupt.
